item.description:
ðŸš€ VE v26.2.10

What's new in this release:

  • 26.2.10
  • 26.2.9
  • Implement loading skeleton view in InstructionsView to enhance user experience during data loading. Display a full skeleton when instructions are being loaded, ensuring consistent visual feedback across the application.
  • Enhance loading views across DictionaryView, LogsView, and VoiceView with detailed skeleton UI elements for improved user experience during data loading. Adjust layout and styling for consistency and better visual feedback.
  • Refactor Dictionary and Voice services to streamline word management by consolidating parameters for add and update operations. Update UI components to reflect changes in data structure, enhancing user experience and consistency across the application.
  • Curosr Detetcion
  • New Changes
  • checking
  • Add new color set for SurfaceInverse and update font styles across various components for improved consistency and readability.
  • Hold Feature
  • Enhance loading view in IntentMailView with detailed skeleton UI elements for improved user experience during data loading.
  • Update font styles and padding in IntentMailView for improved consistency and readability.
  • Remove unused GeneralSans font files and adjust AppLogoView for improved icon scaling and layout consistency.
  • Refactor font usage in ToastView and HomeView components to utilize predefined styles from ThemeManager. Removed font registration logic from ThemeManager and updated skeleton view dimensions for better layout consistency.
  • Logs Appearnce

ðŸš€ VE v26.2.9

What's new in this release:

  • Implement loading skeleton view in InstructionsView to enhance user experience during data loading. Display a full skeleton when instructions are being loaded, ensuring consistent visual feedback across the application.
  • Enhance loading views across DictionaryView, LogsView, and VoiceView with detailed skeleton UI elements for improved user experience during data loading. Adjust layout and styling for consistency and better visual feedback.
  • Refactor Dictionary and Voice services to streamline word management by consolidating parameters for add and update operations. Update UI components to reflect changes in data structure, enhancing user experience and consistency across the application.
  • Curosr Detetcion
  • New Changes
  • checking
  • Add new color set for SurfaceInverse and update font styles across various components for improved consistency and readability.
  • Hold Feature
  • Enhance loading view in IntentMailView with detailed skeleton UI elements for improved user experience during data loading.
  • Update font styles and padding in IntentMailView for improved consistency and readability.
  • Remove unused GeneralSans font files and adjust AppLogoView for improved icon scaling and layout consistency.
  • Refactor font usage in ToastView and HomeView components to utilize predefined styles from ThemeManager. Removed font registration logic from ThemeManager and updated skeleton view dimensions for better layout consistency.
  • Logs Appearnce
  • Voice Logs
  • Voice Logs

ðŸš€ VE v26.2.8

What's new in this release:

  • Implement loading skeleton view in InstructionsView to enhance user experience during data loading. Display a full skeleton when instructions are being loaded, ensuring consistent visual feedback across the application.
  • Enhance loading views across DictionaryView, LogsView, and VoiceView with detailed skeleton UI elements for improved user experience during data loading. Adjust layout and styling for consistency and better visual feedback.
  • Refactor Dictionary and Voice services to streamline word management by consolidating parameters for add and update operations. Update UI components to reflect changes in data structure, enhancing user experience and consistency across the application.
  • Curosr Detetcion
  • New Changes
  • checking
  • Add new color set for SurfaceInverse and update font styles across various components for improved consistency and readability.
  • Hold Feature
  • Enhance loading view in IntentMailView with detailed skeleton UI elements for improved user experience during data loading.
  • Update font styles and padding in IntentMailView for improved consistency and readability.

  • Refactor font usage in ToastView and HomeView components to utilize predefined styles from ThemeManager. Removed font registration logic from ThemeManager and updated skeleton view dimensions for better layout consistency.

ðŸš€ VE v26.2.7

What's new in this release:

  • Release
  • removed the window shadow
  • fixed loader
  • Update background colors in WorkspaceConnectorsView for improved visual consistency and hierarchy.
  • Refactor UI components in Settings views to improve styling and consistency. Removed unused SVG assets and adjusted background colors for better visual hierarchy. Added keyboard shortcut for settings access.
  • feat: Display text input caret on screenshots, improving accuracy for Electron/Chromium apps.
  • Own App and Commented out Notch Tab
  • Remove background styling and overlay from sidebar button in SettingsView
  • Changes
  • refactor: ensure dictation targets external applications and broaden app activity extraction scope by removing validation and sidebar isolation.
  • HIde Logic
  • Cursor Detection
  • Cursor Active
  • ui completed
  • Refactor InstructionRowView: Simplify button layout and adjust hover opacity

ðŸš€ VE v26.1.44

What's new in this release:

  • chore: remove the Icons
  • fix: solve image upload issue
  • feat: added intent model section
  • Fetch_Onboard will be called on early-access
  • changed url
  • feat: Update HomeView to conditionally display help section and refactor IntentMailView for improved intent model handling; enhance HomeService to utilize dictation count in usage statistics
  • updated the response handling
  • handled esc
  • prevented the duplicate sessions
  • resolved restrict diction while prediction
  • handled 404 status
  • handled ui response
  • feat: Improve HomeView loading state handling and enhance HomeService with date formatting for usage statistics queries
  • Toggle Issue Solved
  • added white mask

ðŸš€ VE v26.1.43

What's new in this release:

  • API Integration for connectors
  • Revert "check"
  • check
  • Notch Open and Hide
  • changed ui
  • added mic ui and functionality
  • resloved closed notch in open screen and added key in diction
  • sending used text to prediction on enter key down
  • Commenedted Out Notion,Teams,CLickup Integration
  • Refactored VEAIApp.swift
  • Quit Issue Solved
  • Update Preferences Toast
  • early-access Refresh
  • Release 42
  • Commented out Home Tab

  • resloved bluetooth connected build in mic use
  • showing on top of fullscreen
  • Intercom change
  • added update ui
  • Release
  • Fixed
  • Add window title retrieval to AppHelper and update UnifiedAudioService to include it in payload
  • fixed prediictionText bug
  • Intercom chnage version
